com.google.appinventor.components.runtime
Class NxtDrive

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LegoMindstormsNxtBase
          com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.NxtDrive
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, Deleteable
public class NxtDrive
extends LegoMindstormsNxtBase

A component that provides a high-level interface to a LEGO MINDSTORMS NXT robot, with functions that can move and turn the robot.

Author:
lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)
